entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: TraceEventDispatcher.ProcessAsync #95562
  • Configuration binding generator produces incorrect type #95561
  • Design limitation: inability to define environment variables *without a value* on Unix-like platforms. #95559
  • Inconsistent CSharpCodeProvider.GenerateCodeFromCompileUnit output between net472 and net6/7/8 #95553

Closed

  • Allow custom equality comparer on ConcurrentDictionary TryUpdate #25559
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Options extending System types cases in Options source generator #95560
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Add note about docker in the testing doc (fix #95436) #95557
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Check for reachable preds in RBO #95556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable activation injection for unix #95555
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 119.0.6045.199, windows: 119.0.6045.200 #95551
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Wasm runtime features #95486
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Simplify condition for building cross-Jits #95546
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [NO-MERGE] CoreCLR runtime instrumentation for measuring type load performance #95288
    NO-MERGE, area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Improve branch optimizer around implied relops #95234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Always unroll GT_STORE_BLK for blocks with gc refs on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Implement NativeWalker. #94853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Move most of the remaining Strong Name code to internal to the C++ file and remove duplicate validation #95536
    area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HubFilter - Identifying called method #52555
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #52554
  • Grpc JsonTranscoding - use JsonException instead of InvalidOperationException #52552
  • .NET 8.0 - Visual Studio - Confusion #52548
  • StaticHtmlRenderer escapes apostrophes/quotes unnecessarily, breaking script blocks #52547
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, mvc, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #52546

Closed

  • Add support to add RouterLink to the Router #38553
    Planning: WebUI
  • QUESTION: Is it possible to create a query parameter name transformer for blazor? #37811
    Planning: WebUI
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, https #52541
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #52545
  • Add OpenApi Support to Blazor WASM aspnetcore hosted template #34200
    Planning: WebUI
  • [BLAZOR] - [DefaultFragment] attribute for Blazor components [Request] #33464
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Feature request] support to use blazor razor as template engine to render report and save the raw string #30717
    8.0-preview3
  • Loggin in with a popup in Blazor WebAssembly #32906
    Planning: WebUI
  • Binding the value of components to complex objects #32814
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor WASM apps should display an error that the current browser isn't supported #32410
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor WASM: Detailed Error on Production Environment #31699
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor Could Support More Route Constraints #29340
    Planning: WebUI
  • Incorrect string interpolation throwing InvalidOperationException in WebAssemblyComponentParameterDeserializer #52537
  • Perf regression: json #52531
  • Blazor wasm globalization / localization not working / stopped working - IStringLocalizer<T> #32359
    Planning: WebUI
  • What's the difference between these two code snippets #33894
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor Virtualize<T> bug with contenteditable elements #33395
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazorwasm hot-reload breaks if changes are made before socket is connected #32207
    Planning: WebUI
  • JSInterop invocation breaks circuit if canceled during running client script. #34534
    Planning: WebUI
  • Inline SVG is not rendered properly #35650
    Planning: WebUI
  • Running Blazor wasm on a domain other than localhost breaks the debugger. #35035
    Planning: WebUI
  • InteractiveServer on Router breaks routers with 2 or more path segments #52543

PullRequests

Created

  • HeaderDictionaryTypeExtensions not using Dictionary #52551
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • Missing $ in WebAssemblyComponentParameterDeserializer when throwing InvalidOperationException #52538
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Handle rejected promises inside incoming Invocation messages #52523
    area-signalr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VersionTracking only return 1.0.0.1 on Windows platform #19179
  • Flyout Icon is not displayed on android. Works fine on Windows. #19178
  • BackgroundImageSource does not work in iOS - .net 8 #19176
  • Parent container not expanding to show Images in iOS #19175

Closed

  • `CarouselView` on `Windows` doesn't update `SelectedItem` #15900

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Windows] Fix setting flyout width (#19068) #19070
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19169
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • HasData only works with ModelBuilder and not with EntityTypeBuilder #32498

Updated

  • Combine length/precision/scale/collation... from both operands in type inference #32333
  • Allow passing complex type instances to `ExecuteUpdate` #32058
  • Enable more value object scenarios #31238
    Backlog
  • Better support for team development of database migrations #32351
  • Accept `Action<SetPropertyCalls>` in `ExecuteUpdate` #32018
    Backlog
  • Support ExecuteUpdate when the value selector is a collection #32494
  • Nav expansion does not handle ExecuteUpdate #32493
  • SqliteException "no such column : rX.value" when ordering on subquery value in combination with a "where contains" when upgrading from 7 to 8.0.0-rc.2.23480.1 #32234
  • translate `Nullable<T>.GetValueOrDefault()` with `IsNull()` #32471

PullRequests

Created

  • Attempt to reduce flakiness in ExecuteReader_throws_when_busy tests #32501
  • Update Grpc.AspNetCore #32500
  • Handle updating complex type properties in ExecuteUpdate #32499

Merged

  • Fix expression cloning when table changes in SelectExpression.VisitChildren #32456
